messages.subject: "Temping - All is Impermanence"
messages.msgSnippet: ... things. Attachment to a salaried job sure fits the bill; so consider temping for a more flexible, pleasant, and enlightened existence.
messages.messageBody:
About the article by Dana Nibby:

>>Buddha taught that all suffering is a result of attachment to impermanent
things. Attachment to a salaried job sure fits the bill; so consider temping
for a more flexible, pleasant, and enlightened existence. <<

To access the article, go to:

http://www.moretimeoff.com

Dana is a long-time e-mail correspondent of mine. He has a knack for
writing great articles loaded with lots of practical advice on how to
prevent career demands from robbing us of a healthy life of leisure. This
guy has done his homework. His arguments are always well-grounded.

Why not introduce these concepts to our children as they explore various
career options?

John Andersen
Unconventional Ideas at http://unconventional.go.to
